name: Swifty's Ninth Sym-punny Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct American English, although the pronunciation may not be. The hint will tell the number of words and letters.  Also the beginning and last letters IE: S/LY or S/D.  There are no periods after any of the answers...sorry for the error in a previous quiz.


QUESTION ONE: "This boat is leaking," said Craig ___.
questions.explanation:
Balefully.

	If you're in a leaky boat, you'd better be bailing...if you bail...hopefully your bail is full.

questions.text: "There's a winged insect in my French cheese," said Jo ___.
questions.explanation:
Briefly.

	French cheese = Brie, winged insect =  fly...brie + fly = briefly.

questions.text: "I won't finish in fifth place or worse," Ellie held ___.
questions.explanation:
Forth.

	If you won't finish fifth, chances you're holding fourth place.

Claimed.

	If you own a gold mine, you have a claim.

questions.text: "Fifty-two episodes can fill a year," Valerie said, ___.
questions.explanation:
Weakly.

	Fifty-two weeks in a year.

questions.text: "Can't we play an old-fashioned card game?" Jeff said ___.
questions.explanation:
Wistfully.

	Whist is an old card game.

questions.text: "I don't know anything about those bizarre rumors involving me and waterfowl," Shar said, ___ the question.
"And two plus two is four!" Sharon ___.

questions.explanation:
Hypocritically.

	Critical of a Hippopotamus?  Hypocritical.
